Reviews.Title: “Horrible rooms and no customer service”
Reviews.Author: Christina M
Reviews.Content: originally chose hotel close central station crap family run hotel customer service unfriendly outdated filthy located ghetto city recommend hotel unless mugged keys leave hotel guests allowed entering permission horrible hotel terrible staff

Reviews.Title: “Good budget location”
Reviews.Author: Peter M Grant
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend break budget hotel close termini station clean bed excellent wifi setup free noise street below unreasonable breakfast organised pretty italian standards lots excellent restaurants break main tourist spots close termini metro station bus stops 11 euro day pass allows access rome lido

Reviews.Title: “Excelent!!”
Reviews.Author: erral
Reviews.Content: found hotel tripadvisor booked bookingcom booked 3 days 3 double 270 € value money hotel wonderful bathroom modern tvs hotel location 3 streets termini station near short walk breakfastbuffet excelent lot orangejuice coffee tea chocolate lot hotel free wifi service code receptiondesk definetely hotel visit rome

Reviews.Title: “Good family owned Hotel”
Reviews.Author: vforsey
Reviews.Content: hotel family runned business close trainbus station clean tidy huge including double bed twins 65 euro included breakfast continental wasnt spectacular expect free breakfast 65 euro night crowded share table try accommodate rough night sleeping due loud traffic outside hot close windows ac told owns front deskhe fan brought appreciated remembered name nice jesture walking distance attractions close hop bus close restaurants laundry mat street definitely worth money looking decent 23 star hotel
